value.name: 'Bo's Law' passes in Texas legislature; heads to Gov.'s desk
value.description: A Texas law named in honor of Botham Jean is headed to Gov. Greg Abbott's desk. The initial version of "Bo’s Law" would have clarified the state’s castle doctrine and eliminate loopholes used for some defenses.

value.name: Texas House of Representatives passes historic bill in the name of Botham Jean
value.description: Former police officer Amber Guyger was convicted of Jean’s murder and claimed she thought she was entering her own apartment when she allegedly mistook Jean for an intruder and took his life.

value.name: Court To Hear Amber Guyger Appeal Murder Charge In Death Of Botham Jean

value.name: Jury Sentences Convicted Murderer, Ex-Cop Amber Guyger To 10 Years In Prison
value.description: A jury sentenced former Dallas police officer Amber Guyger, who was convicted of murdering her neighbor, Botham Shem Jean in his own home to ten years in prison. 13 hours ago North Texans Continue ...

value.name: Dallas officer charged with manslaughter after killing neighbor
value.description: Dallas police officer Amber Guyger allegedly entered an apartment that she believed was her own and fatally shot the resident, 26-year-old Botham Shem Jean. Guyger was arrested on manslaughter ...
